title: Monster Children font
content:
I love how this font looks, any ideas what typeface this is?

much appreciated!

tx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228180052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1234_3764.jpg)
author: lolacreative

comments.content:
It seems hand-drawn to me, but it reminds me of [Linotype Gneisenauette](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228180052/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gneisenauette/), which could be a substitute choice.

- Mike Yanega
That is handlettered. i think the designer is [http://evanhecox.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228180052/http:/evanhecox.com/ "http://evanhecox.com")
